评论详情: This product is way off on size chart and description.  Not the loose/baggy I wanted. Ordered a large according to the size chart. They were more like the skinny joggers kids are wearing today. Not what I wanted.
These were worn a few times when they split open in the bottom. The fabric frayed away so they couldn’t be restitched.

评论概述: Not too baggy not to tight
评论详情: The pants wait time is pretty long but when I got them they were better then I thought. Fabric was thinker then I thought too so over all when unbox it was 8/10
My kiddo is skinny and these pants were snug. I’d recommend shopping elsewhere or order 2 sizes larger.

The pants look great and all but I'd suggest going one size smaller than you normally would get. I ordered a medium and it looks like a large, all I can say is that they definitely weren't joking about the "wide leg" part.
